text: 15:9 Aposel 10:15; 10:28; 10:34-35; Rom 10:11; 1 Korin 1:2; 1 Pita 1:22Godɨn damazimɨn Judaba ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, e bar magh ghue. Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn itima, God men nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tuavimɨn, men navibagh amizɨ me an damazimɨn dera.
